items.content_html: Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. It is a simple way to add formatting like headers, bold, bulleted lists, and so on to a plain text. Markdown uses a simple formatting syntax to accomplish the same thing that HTML does, but it is simpler than HTML.
items.title: NoahCrown/Markdown-Previewer: Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. It is a simple way to add formatting like headers, bold, bulleted lists, and so on to a plain text. Markdown uses a simple formatting syntax to accomplish the same thing that HTML does, but it is simpler than HTML.
